name: UPatternTool_ScaleSettings
doc: Settings for Per Element Scale in the Pattern Tool

bProportional: If true, changes to Start Scale, End Scale, and Jitter are proportional along all the axes
bInterpolate: If true, Scale is linearly interpolated between StartScale and Scale values
bJitter: If true, Scale at each Pattern Element is offset by a uniformly chosen random value in the range of [-ScaleJitterRange, ScaleJitterRange]
StartScale: Scale applied to all Pattern Elements, or to first Pattern Element for Interpolated scale
EndScale: Scale applied to last Pattern Element for Interpolated scale
Jitter: Upper bound of the range which is sampled to randomly scale each Pattern Element if Jitter is true
